column1: China’s Hubei province, the epicenter of the coronavirus epidemic, reported 1,933 new cases and 100 new deaths on Feb. 16, the local health authority said on Monday. https://www.reuters.com/article/us-china-health-hubei/chinas-hubei-reports-1933-new-cases-of-coronavirus-on-feb-16-health-bureau-idUSKBN20A0QQ?il=0 …
